about_the_game:
Threat Actor is a cybercrime-themed RTS game featuring a series of campaign maps with increasingly complex mechanics and objectives.

THE DARK HUB

As a fresh member of an infamous cybercrime organization called The Dark Hub, your life depends on whether you can prove your worth to the faction's leaders by successfully completing your assignments.

As you slowly climb the leadership ladder, it is only a matter of time before some of the senior staff members start to see you as a threat.

THE DARK WEB

Your criminal enterprise resides on the Dark Web, a 3D topdown map filled with various resources, factions and hostile malware entities.

Occupied by all kinds of people - from simple scammers to hackers, creeps and dangerous members of the occult, you will encounter a variety of quests and other interactions designed around given campaign map's theme.

THE CRIME ECONOMY

Participate in the dark web economy by building out your marketplace. Create workers to gather resources and manage your organization's income, population and amenity level. Produce units to defend your base or attack hostile organizations. Hire moderators to work at the marketplace's facilities and leverage your faction's economy to accomplish the map's objective.
